attributes.action: Save Dunswell Primary School from Closure
attributes.additional_details: The Community and Parents of Dunswell Primary School want to change the Goverment Policy on Spending Cuts within  Local Authoritys, Dunswell Primary School is a village school with two thirds of its pupils from Hull LA Catchment, and the East Riding LA does not see it part of its duty to provide education places for Hull pupils, our children will be moved into PORTACABINS  on the site of another primary school 3 miles away. If this happens it will take the Heart out of the Community.We request the East Riding of Yorkshire Council examine all possible options, to keep Dunswell Primary School Open.
